setting.description: The URL to notify on article publication
setting.name: notification_manager_url
setting.pretty_name: Notification URL for connecting to the notification manager

setting.description: The authentication URL to use when authenticating with the notification service.
setting.name: notification_manager_authorization_url
setting.pretty_name: Authorization URL for connecting to the notification manager

setting.description: The email to authorize with the notification manager
setting.name: notification_manager_email

setting.description: The password to authorize with the notification manager
setting.name: notification_manager_password
